name: noncontroversial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a subject, statement, etc.) which is unlikely to cause disagreement or argument : Most books about the city focus on noncontroversial topics like history and art. The concept behind the proposal is relatively noncontroversial; I'm hoping people will get behind it. The two presidents discussed a range of non-controversial issues, including funds to fight AIDS, malaria, hunger, and illiteracy.
